data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simões, Marianna V. P., Monné, Marcela L. (2014): Taxonomic Revision of the genus Mesomphalia Hope, 1839 (Insecta, Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae). Zootaxa 3835 (2): 151-197, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3835.2.1
